output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in this post.
2. Refers to candidate: YES - The post directly refers to George Simion, who is a confirmed presidential candidate (Position 2 on the official list).
3. Addresses wide population: YES - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Has reached between 80,000-89,999 impressions - Significant spend of 200-299 RON - Estimated audience size over 1 million - Clearly intended for mass distribution
4. Electoral objective: YES - The content specifically discusses electoral chances ("cea mai mare șansă să intre în turul al doilea") - Focuses on electoral outcome predictions - Timing during election period - Uses emotional markers (🔥‼️) to draw attention
5. Journalism: NO - This appears to be promotional content rather than objective journalism - The use of emotional markers and sensational formatting suggests propaganda rather than news - Lacks journalistic balance or objectivity
6. Personal opinion: While it references someone's opinion (Szakáts István), this is being promoted as paid content, transforming it from personal opinion to propaganda.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Directly references a presidential candidate - Is being actively promoted through paid channels - Has significant reach and targeting - Discusses electoral outcomes - Published after the end of the legal campaign period - Uses emotional markers to influence opinion
conclusion.message-for-police: PresaLibera.ro, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale, constând într-o postare plătită pe Facebook (ID: 2062388527550424) care promovează șansele electorale ale candidatului George Simion. Materialul, difuzat după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, folosește markeri emoționali și prezintă explicit șansele electorale ale candidatului, având un impact semnificativ cu peste 80.000 de afișări și o audiență estimată de peste 1 milion de persoane. Cheltuielile de promovare între 200-299 RON demonstrează intenția clară de propagandă electorală în afara perioadei legale.
